title: Automated chemoenzymatic modular synthesis of human milk oligosaccharides on a digital microfluidic platform
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17397-17405
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01395F, Paper

Yiran Wu, Yunze Sun, Caixia Pei, Xinlv Peng, Xianming Liu, Eika W. Qian, Yuguang Du, Jian-Jun Li
Eleven HMOs have been successfully synthesized through enzymatic modules on the DMF platform.
